text: This Service uses these "cookies" to collection information and to improve our Service.
We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, we collect data that your browser sends to us that is called Log Data.
The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy unless you uninstall our Service.
We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information.
In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers.
